Man kann DbD eigtl. nur bedingt empfehlen. Denn wer sich darauf einlässt, sollte bedenken, dass es ein gutes schlechtes Spiel ist. Es lockt ein einzigartiges asymmetrisches Multiplayer-Spiel mit Katz-und-Maus-Spiel in einem Horrorsetting mit einigen Horrorikonen. 
Zum anderen muss man vielen Bugs, schlechte Optimierung, fragwürdigen Balance-Entscheidungen und einen unglaublich großen Grind rechnen. Ein Spiel mit einer Menge Frustpotential. Wer sich aber dessen gewachsen sieht, der kann schon eine Menge Spaß haben.
Gierka jest koxx :)

Oyun 5 oyuncudan oluşuyor.1 katil 4masum haritada bulunan bozuk jeneratörleri tamir ederek katilden kaçmaya çalışıyorsunuz.Kaçış yerlerini bulmanız için 5adet jeneratörü tamir ettikten sonra haritada bulunan kaçış yelerini gidiyorsunuz ve büyük ihtimal kaçıyorsunuz.Katil tarafından yaraldıktan sonra kancalara asılabilirsiniz ve kancalardan kaçmanın en mantıklı yolu katil oradan uzaklaştıktan sonra arkadaşınızın gelip sizi oradan alması.Fakat kancaya 3kez yaralanıp katil tarafından asılırsanız otomatikman ölüyorsunuz.Haritanın bazı bölgelerinde tokenler bulunuyor bu tokenleri bulup bozarsanız katilin yeteneklerini azaltabiliyorsunuz.Masumların işine yarayacak bir sandıkta bulunuyor sandığın içinden medkit ve fener çıkıyor.Eğer hafif yaralı iseniz kendinizi medkit yardımı ile iyileştirebilirsiniz.Fakat katil tarafından yere düşürülmüş ve hareket edemiyor iseniz ya arkadaşınızın gelmesi lazım yada katilin size kancaya asma lazım :) Fener ise katilin gözlerine tutulduğu takdirde katili yaklaşık 3saniyelik kör ediyor buda gerçekten güzel bir özellik.Oyunu almanızı tavsiye ederim

Note: This game is one of my main games that I like very much because of its idea ...
But this does not make me positive because the game has many problems and no effort is made by the developers so that the game can find its place among the gamers. Of course, it is not the next thing that the game has not been able to find itself after 5 years. Because the life of the game is like this, it becomes longer and its problems are more and more unsolvable.
1- Tunneling the killer instead of using ridiculous flakes (I do not know why it should be flaky at all, this should be a prevention so that when you take someone down from the hook, the person who was hooked will not be hit)
2- Camping the killer: This will cause the person who wants to bring the player down from the hook to not be able to do his job properly and the killer will try and the person will not have enough space to be able to save the other player, so two of them will die. : |
3- Killer can do all the paperwork, but the survivor can only do very small things and does not have the strength to cope, for example, a killer like Legion, who himself should not be so human, if he is not like the rest of the characters, then why in terms of Better power and speed.
4 - Why can the killer run away from the survivor and jump out of the window if the survivor is not the window, so how is it possible ?????
5 - The blades of some killers are too strong and make the game uneven towards the killer
6- The cannibal killer is very strong and the fact that you can buy it with real money makes fun of the game because by turning on a chainsaw, the side can run all the way to the survivors and hit them with one blow (oh, this is my interesting and attractive place). I do not understand??? )
7- Why could he only play with the survivor in the afternoon and with the killer only at night and if it is the other way around, he will not find any game at all ???
8- What does error code four dimensions 5 years mean ?? : What does it really mean that you come out of the game in the middle of the game, your rank decreases, you can not go in the game and you have to do everything for eternity, for what reason ?? The reason is that a series of game files are deleted automatically: \
And...
Thousands of other problems and bugs that the developers did not care about armor and this is unacceptable and ridiculous and I am really sorry for the game developers who are waiting for the game and their fans to hope that the game will improve like me. And take Johnny, but that never happens

這是一款很耐玩的遊戲，但並不是完全沒有缺點

吸引人的優點有：
單人也可以玩的鬼、可以多排四人玩的人，一個遊戲充當單機多人
可以農，所有鬼的傳承技能全開到所有人的傳承技能全開
再到所有人鬼的主要技能點滿 也是需要很長一段時間

不吸引人的缺點：
基本上他還是一款吃重技巧的遊戲
人雖只有修機補血救人跟鬼繞逃出五個環節
但也夠新玩家練一段時間了
鬼甚至還有22隻不同技能 約四到五種不同打法觀念
地圖重新熟悉以及輸掉的挫敗感
這些東西也很容易讓剛入坑的玩家被勸退

如果撐過陣痛期的話這遊戲是很好玩的 推薦

Dead by Daylight is best played with friends. One of the great things about this game is the fact that even if you don't have the DLC's for the monsters, you still get to face them online, so you're still playing against the likes of Michael Meyers, Pyramid Head, Ghostface, etc. However, it is really unfortunate that the wait times as a hunter are so long. When queing as a survivor, the wait times are usually fine, about 2-3 minutes to find a match and another 2 minutes before you're actually in the game playing. However, if you que as the the killer, expect a wait time of at least 10 minutes, which can feel especially long because you can't play with you're friends as the killer. You must play with randoms, which is sort of understandable, but it is still a bummer that I can't hunt down and kill my friends without creating a custom game. Other than that, the actual game itself is quite fun and I would recommend it for anybody that loves horror or just wants a fun game to play with friends (as survivors).

update: i still hate this game

Dead by Daylight is a horror fanatics wet dream. It exists as both a competitive, action-packed, match-to-match grinding roller coaster and a fun game to play with/against your friends. It's easily become one of my favorite games but is not for everyone. As an asymmetrical game, there's two distinct play styles that function to drive each match, but both come with their own hassles and inconveniences. But to play and learn is probably what keeps me at over 300+ hours.
